description: Pre-Launch Polish & Internationalization - Fix visual issues and add multi-language onboarding for external beta launch

userStories.title: Fix Theme Toggle Icon Position
userStories.description: Dark/light theme toggle icon appears in the wrong position (top left corner) instead of its intended location in the header toolbar. This is a regression from previous work and needs immediate fix.
acceptanceCriteria: Locate theme toggle component in codebase
Move icon to correct header position (top right with settings/controls)
Verify position on mobile viewport (375px width)
Verify position on desktop viewport (1280px+ width)
Check for CSS conflicts or layout issues
Take screenshot showing correct placement in both viewports
Run typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit from apps/ui/ (must pass)
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Dark Mode Styling for Onboarding Tour
userStories.description: When app is in dark mode, the React Joyride onboarding tour displays tooltips with light theme styling, creating poor contrast and inconsistent visual experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect current theme (light/dark) in OnboardingTour component
Apply theme-appropriate colors to Joyride tooltips using custom styles
Test tour in light mode: verify light tooltips render correctly
Test tour in dark mode: verify dark tooltips render correctly
Verify contrast ratios meet accessibility standards (WCAG AA)
Optional: Test theme toggle during active tour (edge case)
Take screenshots showing both light and dark tour appearances
Run typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit from apps/ui/ (must pass)
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Fix Example Pipe Color Consistency
userStories.description: Vertical pipes (border-left indicators) next to example sentences have inconsistent colors and low visibility. First pipe appears darker than subsequent pipes, and some pipes have different colors from text.
acceptanceCriteria: Standardize pipe color across all examples using theme variable
Ensure all pipes use same border-width
Remove any first-child styling causing inconsistency
Verify visibility in light mode
Verify visibility in dark mode
Test on both mobile and desktop viewports
Run typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit from apps/ui/ (must pass)
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Multi-Language Onboarding Selection
userStories.description: Add native language selection as the first step of onboarding. Currently, onboarding runs in Dutch, which non-Dutch speakers cannot understand. Before showing the tutorial, users must select their preferred language (English, Russian, or Dutch).
acceptanceCriteria: Create language selection component/modal
Offer exactly 3 languages: English, Russian, Dutch
Create translation files: locales/en.json, locales/ru.json, locales/nl.json
Translate all onboarding copy into EN, RU, NL
Store selected language in localStorage (key: onboarding_language)
Load correct translation file based on selection
Pass locale to Joyride for tutorial text
Skip/dismiss option defaults to English
Language preference persists across sessions
Add language selector to Settings page for changing later
All three languages have complete onboarding translations (no missing keys)
Run typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit from apps/ui/ (must pass)
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP: test all 3 languages
